name: Office Hours 10/30/20 – Get Started with Variants
description:
Join me and Luis as we walk through everything you need to get started with variants! This is the file accompanying the livestream. There's links to all the documentation, some examples we built during the stream, and links to a few community files!


These are just the intro slides and examples used in the livestream. If you're looking for resources on variants check out:

  • Variants Documentation
  • Prepare for Variants
  • Variants Playground File
  • Variants Best Practice Guide


Thanks to the 1,000+ attendees who joined and asked questions!! ♥️ if you find this file helpful! Tweet us or @figmadesign
